issue.title: Issue with compiling tests/example_sig.c on Ubuntu
issue.body:
Hello, 

I tried to compile the tests/example_sig.c by running `$CC -Ibuild/include -Lbuild/lib tests/example_sig.c -o example_sig -loqs` in the top level directory of liboqs. However, I ended up getting the following error message: 

> bash: -Ibuild/include: No such file or directory

Prior to running the command I made sure to install the dependencies and build the source code which both were successful. What could be wrong here?

issue.title: Undefined references while compiling tests/example_sig.c
issue.body:
I tried compiling the tests/example_sig.c example using the command `gcc -Ibuild/include -Lbuild/lib tests/example_sig.c -o example_sig -loqs` and got the following dump: 

> /usr/bin/ld: build/lib/liboqs.a(rand.c.o): in function `OQS_randombytes_openssl':

> /usr/bin/ld: aes_ossl.c:(.text.OQS_AES256_CTR_sch+0xda): undefined reference to `EVP_CIPHER_CTX_free'
> collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status

Prior to that, I have built liboqs library sucessfully using these commands: 
```
mkdir build && cd build
cmake -GNinja .. 
ninja 
```
Running the complete test suite using the command `ninja run_tests` was succesful. 

I had an issue with running the compile command eailer but it was 'fixed' by setting the default compiler to gcc (`export cc=gcc`) #1230 

I'm using Ubuntu 20.04.3 LTS

issue.title: Problem building documentation
issue.body:
MacOS Monterey 12.4, Xcode-13.4.1 (probably irrelevant).

The errors appear like this:
```
Generating XML output for the main page
/Users/ur20980/src/liboqs/README.md:8: error: unable to resolve reference to 'overview' for \ref command
/Users/ur20980/src/liboqs/README.md:9: error: unable to resolve reference to 'status' for \ref command

/Users/ur20980/src/liboqs/README.md:13: error: unable to resolve reference to 'linuxmacOS' for \ref command
/Users/ur20980/src/liboqs/README.md:14: error: unable to resolve reference to 'windows' for \ref command
/Users/ur20980/src/liboqs/README.md:15: error: unable to resolve reference to 'cross-compilation' for \ref command
/Users/ur20980/src/liboqs/README.md:16: error: unable to resolve reference to 'documentation' for \ref command
/Users/ur20980/src/liboqs/README.md:17: error: unable to resolve reference to 'contributing' for \ref command

lookup cache used 310/65536 hits=905 misses=310
finished...
Exiting...
FAILED: CMakeFiles/gen_docs /Users/ur20980/src/liboqs/build/CMakeFiles/gen_docs
```
